{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "# Manipulating site-frequency spectra\n",
    "\n",
    "fastDFE offers a set of utilities for handling and manipulating site-frequency spectra (SFS) data, especially when there are multiple types. The {class}`~fastdfe.spectrum.Spectra` class is designed to hold and manipulate spectra of multiple types. It provides a number of methods and properties for creating, accessing, and manipulating the spectra data. Usually we would obtain already stratified spectra from {class}`~fastdfe.parser.Parser`, but we can also create them manually."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>"
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from fastdfe import Spectrum, Spectra\n",
    "\n",
    "# create spectra with two subtypes and two types\n",
    "spectra = Spectra.from_spectra({\n",
    "    \"subtype1.type1\": Spectrum.standard_kingman(10) * 1,\n",
    "    \"subtype1.type2\": Spectrum.standard_kingman(10) * 2,\n",
    "    \"subtype2.type1\": Spectrum.standard_kingman(10) * 3,\n",
    "})\n",
    "\n",
    "# plot spectra\n",
    "spectra.plot();"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.605615Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:07.189896Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We access types by their index from which we obtain a {class}`~fastdfe.spectrum.Spectrum` object."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>"
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "sfs: Spectrum = spectra[\"subtype1.type1\"]\n",
    "\n",
    "sfs.plot();"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.693687Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.610251Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We can also use wildcards to access multiple types at once."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Axes: xlabel='allele count'>"
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>"
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "spectra[\"subtype1.*\"].plot()"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.834570Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.695365Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "To get rid of the subtypes, we can merge the spectra over the specified number of groups."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Axes: xlabel='allele count'>"
     },
     "execution_count": 4,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>"
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "spectra.merge_groups(1).plot()"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.959068Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.835494Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "All subtypes for each type are merged into a single spectrum by adding them upp."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "We can also save the spectra to a file and restore them again."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "spectra.to_file(\"out/spectra.csv\")\n",
    "\n",
    "spectra2 = Spectra.from_file(\"out/spectra.csv\")"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.985719Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.960694Z"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "Here we prefix the spectra with a string to distinguish them and then combine them into a Spectra object."
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Axes: xlabel='allele count'>"
     },
     "execution_count": 6,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>"
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>",
      "image/png": ""
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "spectra.prefix('original').combine(spectra2.prefix('restored')).plot()"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "ExecuteTime": {
     "end_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:09.215687Z",
     "start_time": "2023-05-13T08:18:08.985073Z"
    }
   }
  },

   "cell_type": "markdown",
